email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Would you consider $51.00 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your reply. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.50 per ton, but that's the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.50 per ton is acceptable. However, could we agree on a demurrage rate of $18,000 per day? Also, please confirm the laytime start and end dates. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $18,000 per day for demurrage. The laytime will start on 15 October and end on 20 October. I'll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Thanks, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, sounds good. Please send over the charter party agreement, and we'll review it promptly. Thanks for your help. Best, John.
